profile_positions.description: In 2021, we started a project at Huawei in which we are proudly bringing our customer closer to it's sustainable ambitions. We are replacing the power systems of fiber locations that provide services to households. We completed the modernization of a small fraction of all the locations spread over the Netherlands, but the results can already be seen by the reduction of energy consumption and the reduction of service interruption at the modernized locations. It was a challenge to keep the work on site in progress with multiple partners and to ensure the delivery of the new equipment, considering all the obstacles brought by the pandemic. But, as a result, we are now about to start a new phase in which we will not only modernize, but also make it self-sufficient energy wise.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
I started as Project Control Management at Huawei working on two major projects in the Netherlands in which I was responsible to deliver the projects on time, with the required quality and satisfying the KPI's agreed between both parties. Therefore I took care of the new orders received, checked the work to be done and, based on that, planned the milestones, provided related PO's to our partners, managed subcontractor’s activities, assigned the work to our internal teams and worked towards a smooth delivery.
Besides that I also changed the way we report to our customer by replacing excel reports (which required manual adjustments) by Power BI reports. With that, we were able to automatize strategic, tactical and operational reports. This was made by querying data from SQL Server Analysis Service SSAS and Excel files and using DAX and Phython scripts.
profile_positions.title: Project Control Manager

profile_positions.description:
Perform market study analysis and definition of the approach in target private companies and new clients.
Defined potential clients, engage in the first contact, arrange meetings and create opportunities. As a result, during this time I closed deals with new clients totaling over 6 million reais (2 million dollars).
Direct relationship with customers - to build and maintain a good relationship with the clients in order to discover their needs, turn the needs into an opportunity and also place Stefanini as their Top of Mind´s company and digital partner.
Analysis of RFPs (deciding go or not go based on our portfolio and viability of the possible solution), pricing (checking the costs of the solution, deciding the profit and the best approach) and participation in bids (sending the technical and commercial proposal, negotiating the price and being the responsible for the service). 
Contract management – I had to make sure that the services provided by Stefanini were running as planned since the beginning to the end of the contract: 
Mobilizing people from different teams to accomplish tasks, monitoring the activities and its results.
Having daily interaction with Stefanini´s operational team to be aware of the difficulties and the success of the service and, when it was necessary, support them on the tasks and negotiation with the client. 
Interacting with the clients to get their feedback of the services provided by Stefanini, negotiating and making adjustments on the services. 
It was my responsibility to guarantee that the services were rentable. I did it by analyzing the costs in each services, checking if it was right, finding ways to  gain efficiency and reduce the cost. I was also responsible to measure the service provided and to bill the client.
Stefanini´s business managers are responsible and active in the complete sales cycles: from studying and prospecting to charging the client for the service provided.
profile_positions.title: Business Manager

profile_positions.description:
Study and define the approach in target public companies in Rio de Janeiro and Espírito Santo. 
Analyze tenders from the government deals (deciding go or not go based on our portfolio and viability of the possible solution), pricing (checking the costs of the solution, deciding the profit and the best approach), document preparation (financial, legal and technical documentations) and participation in bids (sending offers and negotiating with the buyer).  As a result, during this time I closed deals with public companies totaling over 8.6 millions of  reais (2.8 millions of dollars).
Create the solution and the price for tenders which was basically labor allocation. For that, I had to define:  the amount of people for the service, value of the salary (I had to make sure it was competitive with the market), the amount of money necessary for food, insurance, transport, uniform and equipments for the next 3 years. 
Manage 12 employees in a contract which amount was  R$997.793,22 (302K of  dollars). Check the profit and costs of the contract, reduce the costs of the operation and supporting the employees with their needs related to Stefanini, the client and the service.
Responsible for checking the costs and profits of software development in contracts with public companies, analyze the capacity of the production, idleness and instigate demand with the clients.
profile_positions.title: Trainee

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro e Região, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
Understand Stefanini´s departments (Financial , Human Resources, IT, Administration, Software Factory, etc) and how they work and interact between them. In order to achieve this understanding, I had meetings with directors, coordinators and managers.
Identify opportunities at Brazilian public companies based on its document “Master Plan for Information Technology”. 
Analyze and get a historical background of the economic health of the target public companies to check if it was safe to make business with them.
Analyze tenders from the government deals to evaluate Stefanini´s participation based on the risk and benefits of the service and presenting it to my manager.  
Go on technical visit to understand more about the service described on the tender and eliminate doubts related to it.
Create the solution and the price for tenders which was basically labor allocation. For that, I had to define:  the amount of people for the service, value of the salary (I had to make sure it was competitive with the market), the amount of money necessary for food, insurance, transport, uniform and equipments for the next 3 years. 
Prepare the financial, legal and technical documentations to participate in government bids.
profile_positions.title: Intern

company.name: CAPES - Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior

profile_positions.company: CAPES - Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior
profile_positions.description: I was selected to study abroad, being sponsored by the Brazilian government with the Science Without Borders program. The goal was to invest in the training of qualified personnel to obtain the skills and abilities necessary for the advancement of science in the Brazilian society. The selection criteria were: the best scores on the Brazilian national exam (ENEM), the college grades and performance,  the English score (TOEFL) and the acceptance of a foreign university. I was accept by Indiana University - Bloomington where I had English classes. Then I applied and I was accepted  to study IT related classes at  Indiana University-Purdue University Indianapolis. This was my first international trip which I was able not only  to study in high quality universities to develop my academic skills, but I also had the pleasure to travel, to make friends from all over the world, to experience many different cultures. In short, it changed the way I see the world.
profile_positions.title: Bolsista Ciências sem Fronteiras

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro e Região, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
Support and bug fix of the taxes enterprise system.
Research and creation of the User Documentation.
Provide support to end users.
Identify and report the needs of the systems based on the history of requests.
Prepare and schedule software updates to ensure company operations continue running unhindered
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro e Região, Brasil
profile_positions.company: Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro
profile_positions.description:
Maintenance of the computers – Software (Lab network, Microsoft Office, Browsers, Operating System) and hardware (monitors, keyboards, mice and CPU).
Perform administrative activities and customer service.
Management of the computer lab (open and close the computer lab, control the student access of the lab and its equipments and help the students to use the software).
Instructor of informatics - planning  and giving classes of basic informatics to university’s employees, university outsourced employees and students. The classes covered topics as How To Use A Computer, PowerPoint, Excel, Word and Web Development (HTML, CSS and PHP).
profile_positions.title: Technical Academic
